title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Participated in the development of a B2B solution where my responsibilities were business analysis, UI design of a mobile and a web application and development of the web application.
Implemented a web application for IoT solution with real-time data visualization and integrated it into a PLM software.
Built a web application showing real-time events on a map, displaying detailed information about these events and allowed users to manage them.
Created a web application for IoT solution providing sensor management, alerts control, real-time and historical data visualizations.
Involved in the development of a web application with search functionality displaying reports and data sets with custom visualization.
Made data visualizations and interactive demo prototypes.
Updated developer documentation and provided support for frontend developers using the BellaDati Platform.

title: Software Tester
responsibilities: Performed manual testing of the BellaDati BI web and mobile applications.
Incorporated new features into test scenarios and documentation.
Created product videos in Adobe Premiere.
